text:
mA da#dIqyEtiq tasya# saqBAyA#muttAqnO niqpadyaq Buva#nasya pataq itiq tRuNA#niq saM gRu#hNIyAt praqjApa#tiqrvai Buva#nasyaq pati#H praqjApa#tinaiqvAsyAqnnAdyaqmA da#tta iqdamaqhamaqmuShyA# &&*muShyAyaqNasyAqnnAdya(gm)# 
harAqmItyA#hAqnnAdya#mEqvAsya# harati ShaqDBir.ha#ratiq ShaDvA Ruqtava#H praqjApa#tinaiqvAsyAq-nnAdya#mAqdAyaqrtavO$ &smAq anuq praya#cCantiq - [  ]   27
